about.title: About Us - Dashpull Development History
about.description: Learn about Dashpull's journey from exploring AI financial prediction since 2016 to achieving automated trading platform in 2025

story.title: From AI Exploration to Automated Trading
story.description: Dashpull did not appear suddenly, but is based on years of exploration and practice. We started exploring AGI-based financial prediction in 2016, and finally achieved daily Bitcoin prediction and automated trading in 2025.

ai.title: AI-Driven
ai.description: Based on years of AI technology development, achieving stable financial prediction and automated trading

trading.title: Automated Trading
trading.description: Daily automated trading without human intervention, AI system operates independently

reliability.title: Stable & Reliable
reliability.description: Tested and optimized over years, providing reliable trading strategies and risk control

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to providing users with stable and reliable financial prediction and automated trading services through advanced artificial intelligence technology, making investment more intelligent and efficient.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the world's leading AI financial prediction platform, creating long-term stable returns for investors

values.title: Values
values.description: Committed to technological innovation, transparency, integrity, and steady development, creating real value for users
